list.name: agent_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT SpanAttributes['agent.id'] FROM otel.otel_traces WHERE ServiceName = 'pi-bridge' AND SpanName = 'chat.session' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TraceId AS trace_id,
  SpanAttributes['session.id'] AS session_id,
  SpanAttributes['agent.id'] AS agent_id,
  SpanAttributes['chat.source'] AS source,
  SpanAttributes['chat.channel_id'] AS channel_id,
  Timestamp AS started_at,
  Duration / 1e9 AS duration_sec
FROM otel.otel_traces
WHERE ServiceName = 'pi-bridge'
  AND SpanName = 'chat.session'
  AND Timestamp >= $__fromTime
  AND Timestamp <= $__toTime
  AND SpanAttributes['agent.id'] LIKE '${agent_id}'
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
LIMIT 100

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Duration / 1e9 AS duration_sec
FROM otel.otel_traces
WHERE ServiceName = 'pi-bridge'
  AND SpanName = 'chat.session'
  AND Timestamp >= $__fromTime
  AND Timestamp <= $__toTime
  AND SpanAttributes['agent.id'] LIKE '${agent_id}'

SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(Timestamp, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS time,
  count() AS sessions
FROM otel.otel_traces
WHERE ServiceName = 'pi-bridge'
  AND SpanName = 'chat.session'
  AND Timestamp >= $__fromTime
  AND Timestamp <= $__toTime
  AND SpanAttributes['agent.id'] LIKE '${agent_id}'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  SpanName AS span,
  SpanAttributes['session.id'] AS session_id,
  SpanAttributes['turn.index'] AS turn,
  SpanAttributes['tool.name'] AS tool,
  SpanAttributes['llm.model'] AS model,
  SpanAttributes['llm.tokens.input'] AS tokens_in,
  SpanAttributes['llm.tokens.output'] AS tokens_out,
  SpanAttributes['llm.cost_usd'] AS cost,
  SpanAttributes['tool.duration_ms'] AS tool_ms,
  Duration / 1e6 AS duration_ms,
  Timestamp
FROM otel.otel_traces
WHERE ServiceName = 'pi-bridge'
  AND Timestamp >= $__fromTime
  AND Timestamp <= $__toTime
  AND SpanAttributes['agent.id'] LIKE '${agent_id}'
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
LIMIT 200
